dict.acceptation: （表示时间）自始至终；在…期间；遍及…地域；遍及…场所；

sent.orig: Throughout the evening, the man baited Matt mercilessly about the evils of Christendom throughout the ages.
sent.trans: 整个晚上，那人毫不留情地故意激怒麦特。他不停奚落基督教世代以来的恶行。

sent.orig: In this way, the multilateral trading system contributes to economic growth and development throughout the world.
sent.trans: 通过这样一种方式，这一多边贸易体制对世界经济的增长和发展起着重要作用。

sent.orig: Stainless steel fasteners provided throughout assembly.
sent.trans: 在装配的全过程中，均采用不锈钢紧固件。

sent.orig: The following assignments are distributed at various points throughout the semester.
sent.trans: 以下作业在学期的不同时间布置的。

sent.orig: The reigning world champion also slower than his teammate Heikki Kovalainen throughout Friday.
sent.trans: 卫冕世界冠军也慢于他的队友科瓦莱宁在整个周五。
